website_summaries.verdict: A solid pool for a higher price, but you may find the durability and spacious interior worth the splurge.
cons: This is a newer release, and less is known about this brand than some other pools from better-known brands

customer_reviews.title: Love our new pool!!
customer_reviews.text: Love our new pool. It was very easy to put up. The sand was the hardest part to get level. We received it very fast. And they customers service was great keeping in touch with us.Love the liner it was prettier than I was expecting. Beautiful is how I would explain it. Everyone comments about how pretty it is. Highly Recommend this pool and company.❤️❤️❤️
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great pool for price.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup and install. Will need at least 2 people. But definitely a great pool for price.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Lots of time
customer_reviews.text: very simple install. Just time consuming with a couple labor intensive difficulties. Getting the 4 uprights perfectly level and all the same height is critical. this requires digging! and more digging. 3 people is best for this whole job. the wall is heavy as crap and can be a pain to unroll. also, have fun with the liner! did it twice before it was correct. Overall quality product. the liner could have been a little bit bigger though. Im a contractor and it took myself and 2 others around 8 hrs to install. granted, ive never installed a pool before.
customer_reviews.author: ryan p

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Pool
customer_reviews.text: Exceptional Quality - very pretty pool. Last time I bought a pool was 30 years ago so I'm looking forward to a long-term investment!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Pool!!
customer_reviews.text: This has been the best decision our family has ever made. It took some effort to build, albeit the most work being the Earth work. However, the payoff has been worth it. Great value and the ability to walk out on our deck and have this sparkling blue water to cool off in is amazing. The company was great to deal with and quick to respond. Shipping was fast and very responsive. Thank you and will recommend to everyone I know!!
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Horrible investment
customer_reviews.text: Missing parts, company neglected to send us, several attempts, not successful. we had to purchase other places screws, coping strips, we were shorted Very little matched up putting this together, and we do have experience. My husband owns transit, backhoes etc Horrible design whomever designed this product . Plastic is extremely cheap made. Wall aluminum cheap made. Tin we feel more then metal but whatever. Expect to have more then 10.people help with the wall. Video sent 🙄 absolutely worthless, no way to maximize this small video, I did print instructions of similar pool 40+ pages. Hopefully it lasts a couple yrs for our grandchildren, but I highly doubt it. I highly recommend bot to purchase this product.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Bores

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly no directions.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble when you find the correct video youtube. No directions with mine.
customer_reviews.author: Henderson1980

customer_reviews.title: Very good purchase!
customer_reviews.text: We needed an 18' round pool to replace one we had. This one is wonderful! It is well made and durable. We put it up ourselves which was no easy feat! Everything we needed was there. Comes in a warehouse type crate and when we checked all the pieces were there. The liner is good quality. Might be worth paying someone to put up as it took 4 of us all day to do it.
customer_reviews.author: sherry C.

customer_reviews.title: Decent pool. Useless directions
customer_reviews.text: This is a good pool for the money. Kids love it and it was a better value for us than buying a kit. Kids love it and it should provide years of fun. The bad....this thing is horrible to install and most of this is because of the horrible instructions. They are basically useless. Many times while installing my wife would ask me what the directions said and I would just get angry. I really don’t understand why these have not been improved. I would consider myself fairly handy and read the reviews before buying and thought how hard can it be. Fairly difficult! But pool and deck are now finished and we’re enjoying it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal!
customer_reviews.text: Great price! Great pool. This was a replacement pool. Had it pro installed on spot of old pool. Thank you for saving me so much money!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Guy Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: We love it! It is great product for price. All pieces arrived as stated. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Great pool quality - verified!
customer_reviews.text: Great pool quality. I recommend having a professional set it up if you never installed one of these. The pool guy I used said this pool was well made. Liner and skimmer come separate and pool comes on small pallet. I was sceptical if everything was actually in there but it was. Pool comes with a CD that has instructions and a video on how to install. However the pool guy I used installed differently that made more sense. I am certain if I followed the video as I planned I would have messed up the liner. All in all good product. Pools for less is great to work with. Suggest googling them to find number. Not in Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Dan H

customer_reviews.title: Lake Effect Fallston Pool
customer_reviews.text: Was thinking about buying this product, but I'm not sure if I should. The reviews have really helped me with my decision. This pool may not be the right one for me. The price seems great, but there seems to be too many problems with the parts when setting it up.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Coburn-Sykes

customer_reviews.title: Oval swimming pool
customer_reviews.text: Do anybody know what YouTube video for this oval pool
customer_reviews.author: Dionne S.

product_meta.title: Lake Effect Meadows Reprieve 24' Round Above Ground Swimming Pool | 52" Height | Resin Protected Steel Sided Walls | Bundle with Bedrock Pattern 25 Gauge Overlap Pool Liner and Widemouth Skimmer
feature_bullets: RESIN COATED STEEL - This elegantly designed above ground pool features a super strong steel wall that has been hot dip galvanized for protection. The copper bearing steel wall is resin coated both on the inside and outside offering great protection against premature rusting while offering maximum longevity.

BEAUTIFUL BEDROCK PATTERN LINER - Take a dip into the glistening waters of Bedrock and experience the visual of pebbles and seashells at your feet. The North American cut material is hand-folded to prevent permanent creasing and excess wrinkling. Before installing, lay the liner out in the sun for a minimum of one hour to warm up the vinyl ensuring it is able to stretch when adding water. The best temperatures to install would be between 70-80 degrees.

ALL YEAR READY – The Meadows Reprieve above ground swimming pool is designed to remain in place all year round. It offers easy one-time installation as all parts are made specifically for this 24’ round pool as a result of exact-fit components that lock out corrosion. Interlocking stabilizer rails and coping strips fit tightly over your liner and the top of the pool wall locking the Bedrock liner in place.

PERFECT BACKYARD POOL - Why miss out on the fun this summer, when you could be the center of it all? Owning a swimming pool can enhance family time, promote fitness, and it is a social magnet! Your family and friends will be begging to come over. This All-American made outdoor pool makes for the ideal gathering place to stay cool.

SAFE AND SECURE DELIVERY - The pool itself will be shipped via freight services and a valid phone number will need to be shared in advance of shipping. This number will be provided to our freight carriers so they can contact you to schedule a delivery appointment. Be sure to inspect your swimming pool for damages before signing for this shipment. Complimentary liftgate service is included allowing for curbside delivery. NOTE: The liner and skimmer will ship separately from the pool.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars46 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
